channel.title: Now on D00k
channel.description: Recent content in Now on D00k

item.title: Projects
item.description: Because I keep forgetting what projects I planned/want to do, I’ve made this page to put them all in and pick up when I have time. Already Started Projects ∘ Rockbox Theming Book. Projects I’d like to do ∘ Custom Static Site Generator in Python. ∘ Learn UXNTal and writing something in it. ∘ Make an Origami Zine. ∘ Design and 3D Print a replacement insert for my iPod dock.

January ∘ Completing and submitting my college entry portfolio. ∘ Made some updates to the site style and layout. ∘ Started a Linux Wiki for my command line cheatsheets. ∘ Started attempting to make Ascii art Origami Diagrams. February ∘ Working on my new iPod theme, Themify. ∘ Writing the second draft of my Rockbox Theming Book. ∘ Learning Python and GTK, making a Dice Rolling app. March 2023 ∘ Released my customisable iPod theme, Themify.

March ∘ Doing a big clean-out of everything I own. ∘ Hopefully picking up where I left off learning the Linux Command Line. ∘ Heading on my first break away in years, hoping to get some nice shots in a new environment. April ∘ Making a custom theme for my Rockbox iPod. ∘ Burning loads of CDs to Digital for my music collection. ∘ Mostly taking the month to rest and get back on my toes after a terrible health month.
